Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.Stage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Stage extends Object implements Serializable
Stage class to store stage id and data related to stage

      Stage contrustor
      Parameters:
      race - the race the stage belongs to
      stageName - the name of the stage
      description - the stage description
      length - the length of the stage
      startTime - the time the stage will begin
      type - the type of stage

    • concludeStagePreparation

      public void concludeStagePreparation() throws InvalidStageStateException
      Chage the state of the stage to waiting for results. Function can only be called once
      Throws:
      InvalidStageStateException - if the function is called twice

    • pointsForRank

      public int pointsForRank(int rank)
      Calculate the number of points for position in stage. Segments are not considered in this funciton
      Parameters:
      rank - position rider finished in segment
      Returns:
      points the rider gained for finishing position in stage

    • pointsForIntermediateSprints

      public int pointsForIntermediateSprints(Rider rider)
      calculate the points for the intermiedete sprints in stage for a given rider. Not including mountain points
      Parameters:
      rider - rider to calulcate points for
      Returns:
      the points the rider accumulated over the stage

    • pointsForMountainClassification

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the points the rider accumulated over the stage

    • pointsForFlat

      public static int pointsForFlat(int rank)
      Calculates the points for flat finish stage Data from Figure 1 in coursework spesification
      Parameters:
      rank - the rank of the rider
      Returns:
      the points the rider gets for the given rank
